articles.author: Nektaria Stamouli
articles.title: Greek PM slams Sunak as row over Elgin Marbles escalates - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Kyriakos Mitsotakis expresses his ‘annoyance’ that Sunak called off a meeting at late notice
articles.content: ATHENS Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis lashed out at his British counterpart Rishi Sunak on Monday in what would appear to be a bitter escalation of a long-running dispute over the Parthenon… [+1939 chars]
